General.Name: PumaPay
General.Description: PumaPay's open-source Pull Payment Protocol is a comprehensive blockchain solution which offers robust payment mechanisms far more credible, efficient, flexible, cost-effective, and scalable than current implementations (credit cards). Unlike today's payment methods, which include credit cards and virtual coins like Bitcoin, the Pull Payment Protocol was designed from the ground up specifically to overcome existing hurdles and offers a set of tools developed to facilitate onboarding processes for both businesses and individuals.

ICO.Description:
PumaPay's open-source Pull Payment Protocol is a comprehensive blockchain solution which offers robust payment mechanisms far more credible, efficient, flexible, cost-effective, and scalable than current implementations (credit cards). Unlike today's payment methods, which include credit cards and virtual coins like Bitcoin, the Pull Payment Protocol was designed from the ground up specifically to overcome existing hurdles and offers a set of tools developed to facilitate onboarding processes for both businesses and individuals.

Team:

  • Yoav Dror: CEO.
  • Pantelis Foulis: CFO.
  • Gleb Chernov: VP Business Development.
  • Constantinos Eracleous: Smart Contracts Developer.
  • Mat Stone: Cyber Security.
  • Giorgos Kourtellos: Chief Blockchain Architect.
  • Milenko Strika: Head of Product.
  • Stella Evagorou: Developer.
  • Elena Savvides: Head of HR.
  • Efi Klaus: Designer.

PupaPay will be holding its ICO on the 26th of April, 2018. The ICO token supply represents 20% of the total token supply and will be available for 0.00002 ETH each at the offering. The ICO is uncapped and is expected to end on the 2nd of May, 2018.

Token Reserve Split (70%):

  • Public contributors 20%
  • The Company 35%
  • Strategic partners and early adopters 20%
  • Advisors, bounty, bonuses and fees 15%
  • Founding Team 10%
